item.title: Hugo Markdown ðŸ“‹
item.description: TLDR: Just some markdown and what it looks like on this site. This is a collection of markdown examples, which also work with Hugo. (For my reference when adding markdown to future blog posts.) This example Markdown file compliments of markdown-it.github.io h1 Heading 8-) h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading Horizontal Rules Typographic replacements Enable typographer option to see result. (c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +-
